analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.message: Help us improve the app by sending anonymous usage data. It is not possible to deduce your identity at any time.

error.message: Looks like you are no longer enrolled. Please check your Primuss account.

alert.title: Confirm
alert.message: This will log you out of the app and clear all your data.

theme.footer: This changes the color of the icons and buttons in the app.

themes.title: Theme
themes.footer: Change color scheme of the app. This allows you to override the system settings.

dashboard.noShownDescription: Add some cards to your dashboard to get started.
dashboard.footer: Customize your dashboard by dragging and dropping the cards to your preferred order. Hide cards by pressing on the remove icon.

unavailable.title: Unavailable cards
unavailable.message: To use all features of the app, you need to sign in. Tap to continue with your THI account.

grades.averageError: Average grade is currently not available.
grades.missingAverage: The exact average cannot be calculated and ranges between {{min}} and {{max}}.
grades.footer: This is overview is only for general information and is not legally binding. Please refer to the official grades sheet on Primuss for binding information.

error.title: Not available
error.message: Alternative app icons are not available on this device.

appIcon.exclusive: Attend to our events and find easter eggs to unlock exclusive app icons.
